description: Learn about SciPy Japan 2019 (https://www.scipyjapan2019.scipy.org/), the Scientific Computing with Python conference, which will be held April 23-24, 2019 in Tokyo, Japan. The SciPy Japan Conference aims to bring together the growing Scientific Python community in Japan to showcase the latest projects, and learn from skilled users and developers. Register today: https://www.scipyjapan2019.scipy.org/
title: Intro to SciPy Japan 2019: Scientific Python Conference
